name: withMinimumLogLevel
signature: { (level: LogLevel): <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>) => Effect<A, E, R>; <A, E, R>(self: Effect<A, E, R>, level: LogLevel): Effect<A, E, R>; }
description:
Sets the minimum log level for subsequent logging operations, allowing
control over which log messages are displayed based on their severity.
documentation:
